languages.text: {n}Арджента замолкает, о чем-то задумавшись. По ее лицу пробегает тень, а затем — вспышка неких неизвестных эмоций.{/n} "Скажи, Вольный Торговец — ты мне доверяешь? Прошу, ответь, как чувствуешь в сердце своем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента замолкает, о чем-то задумавшись. По ее лицу пробегает тень, а затем — вспышка неких неизвестных эмоций.{/n} "Скажи, Вольный Торговец — ты мне доверяешь? Прошу, ответь, как чувствуешь в сердце своем!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента замолкает, о чем-то задумавшись. По ее лицу пробегает тень, а затем — вспышка неких неизвестных эмоций.{/n} "Скажи, Вольный Торговец — ты мне доверяешь? Прошу, ответь, как чувствуешь в сердце своем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta pauses, thinking about something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotions.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは立ち止まって何かを考えている。彼女の顔が陰り、それから読み取ることのできない感情の光が走る。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、私を信じる？あなたの心の中にあるものを、私に教えてちょうだい！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは立ち止まって何かを考えている。彼女の顔が陰り、それから読み取ることのできない感情の光が走る。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、私を信じる？あなたの心の中にあるものを、私に教えてちょうだい！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔顿了顿，沉思着。她的脸上掠过了一道阴影，随后，某种难以言喻的情绪一闪而过。{/n}“和我说实话，行商浪人，你信任我吗？请审视你的内心，告诉我你的答案吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔顿了顿，沉思着。她的脸上掠过了一道阴影，随后，某种难以言喻的情绪一闪而过。{/n}“和我说实话，行商浪人，你信任我吗？请审视你的内心，告诉我你的答案吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta hace una pausa, contemplando algo. Una sombra cruza su rostro, seguida de un destello de emoción inescrutable.{/n} «Dígame, Comerciante Independiente, ¿confía en mí? Por favor, mire en su corazón y dígame lo que ve».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hace una pausa, contemplando algo. Una sombra cruza su rostro, seguida de un destello de emociones inescrutables.{/n} «Dígame, Comerciante Independiente, ¿confía en mí? Por favor, mire en su corazón y dígame lo que ve».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta hält inne, denkt über etwas nach. Ein Schatten huscht über ihr Gesicht, gefolgt von einer Welle unergründlicher Emotionen.{/n} "Sagt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, vertraut Ihr mir? Bitte blickt in Euer Herz und sagt mir, was Ihr seht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hält inne, denkt über etwas nach. Ein Schatten huscht über ihr Gesicht, gefolgt von einer Welle unergründlicher Emotionen.{/n} "Sagt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, vertraut Ihr mir? Bitte blickt in Euer Herz und sagt mir, was Ihr seht!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta marque une pause, comme plongée dans ses pensées. Une ombre passe furtivement sur son visage, suivie par un éclair d'émotions indéchiffrables.{/n} « Dites-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, me faites-vous confiance ? Je vous en prie, regardez dans votre cœur et dites-moi ce que vous y voyez ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta marque une pause, comme plongée dans ses pensées. Une ombre passe furtivement sur son visage, suivie par un éclair d'émotions indéchiffrables.{/n} « Dites-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, me faites-vous confiance ? Je vous en prie, regardez dans votre cœur et dites-moi ce que vous y voyez ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, bir şeyler düşünürmüş gibi duraksıyor. Yüzünde bir karaltı, ardından da müphem bir duygu beliriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, bana güveniyor musun? Ne olur, yüreğini arayıp sualime cevap ver!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta pauses, contemplating something. A shadow crosses her face, followed by a flash of unreadable emotion.{/n} "Tell me, Rogue Trader, do you trust me? Please, look into your heart and tell me what you see!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta bir şeyler düşünür gibi duraksıyor. Yüzünde bir karaltı, ardından müphem bir duygu beliriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, bana güveniyor musunuz? Ne olur, yüreğinizi arayıp sualimin cevabını verin!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
